about_the_game:
]Rascal Fight is a multiplayer arena brawler with a casual and Hip Pop style. You'll have an exciting combat experience against other players in challenging environments as a rascal.
The game supports both on and offline battle with up to 4 players, where you can jump on wall and perform melee attacks, as well as engage opponents with an arsenal ranging from various weaponry to everyday-items such as baseball bats and fly swatters. Countless of items and gears spawning from the stages provide players with diverse playstyles.

Try out the free Demo now!

content_descriptors.notes: The combat scenes present mild and cartoonized violence.

About the Demo

]Rascal Fight is a multiplayer arena brawler with a casual and Hip Pop style. You'll have an exciting combat experience against other players in challenging environments as a rascal. The game supports both on and offline battle with up to 4 players, where you can jump on wall and perform melee attacks, as well as engage opponents with an arsenal ranging from various weaponry to everyday-items such as baseball bats and fly swatters. Countless of items and gears spawning from the stages provide players with diverse playstyles. Try out the free Demo now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2nd generation Core i3, AMD A6, or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760, AMD R9
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Rascal Fight is a fun and casual fighting game with incredable charm; In the game, you'll have an exciting fight against other players in such a challenging environment as a rascal.
